content.question: Directions: Listen to the selection, then select from among the answer choices the reply that would most probably be made to the remark or question.

choices.label: Ah enfin ! Nous avons attendu assez longtemps.
Il est bien loin, le port ?
Quant à moi, j’en emporte huit.

content.answer: Ah enfin ! Nous avons attendu assez longtemps.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives
